name: John M. Hollerbach
content: John M. Hollerbach John M. Hollerbach Professor Emeritus, Kahlert School of Computing Member, University of Utah Robotics Center Background Publications Teaching Professor Hollerbach's research involves robotics, virtual environments, and human motor control. Current active projects include the following. Locomotion interfaces Haptic Interfaces Contact Information John.HollerbachATutah.edu Office: MEB 3462 School of Computing • 50 S. Central Campus Dr. Rm. 3190 • Salt Lake City, UT 84112 801-581-8224 • Send comments to webmaster@cs.utah.edu Disclaimer
